TFT13_GoopBuff_BerserkerRage.Title: Berserker Rage
TFT13_GoopBuff_BerserkerRage.Description: Gain 20 Ability Power & 20% Attack Damage. Triple it when below 50% Health.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Bulwark.Title: Bulwark
TFT13_GoopBuff_Bulwark.Description: Gain 40 Armor & 40 Magic Resist. Triple it when above 50% health.

TFT13_GoopBuff_DualWielding.Title: Dual Wielding
TFT13_GoopBuff_DualWielding.Description: Gain 2 completed items that fit this champion's role.

TFT13_GoopBuff_EagleEye.Title: Eagle Eye
TFT13_GoopBuff_EagleEye.Description: Gain +1 Range. Every 2 seconds this champion doesn't move, gain 6% Attack Damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Fortified.Title: Fortified
TFT13_GoopBuff_Fortified.Description: Gain 12% max Health. Every 3 seconds, gain another 12% (up to 5 times).

TFT13_GoopBuff_Freestyling.Title: Freestyling
TFT13_GoopBuff_Freestyling.Description: Gain 4.5% Damage Amp for each activated trait you have.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Hypervelocity.Title: Hypervelocity
TFT13_GoopBuff_Hypervelocity.Description: Gain 10% Attack Speed. On cast, gain 15% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

TFT13_GoopBuff_MagicTraining.Title: Magic Training
TFT13_GoopBuff_MagicTraining.Description: Gain 20 Ability Power. On cast, your team gains 2 Ability Power for every 15 Mana spent.

TFT13_GoopBuff_ShouldertheBurden.Title: Protective Shielding
TFT13_GoopBuff_ShouldertheBurden.Description: Combat start and every 8 seconds: Grant 15% max Health Shield to self and 2 lowest health alles for 5 seconds.

TFT13_GoopBuff_StrengthTraining.Title: Strength Training
TFT13_GoopBuff_StrengthTraining.Description: Gain 20% Attack Damage. Every 3 times they attack, your team gains 4% Attack Damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_TheFinisher.Title: The Finisher
TFT13_GoopBuff_TheFinisher.Description: This champion's attacks and Ability executes enemy champions at 15% health or lower.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Thornskin.Title: Thornskin
TFT13_GoopBuff_Thornskin.Description: Gain 60 Armor and 60 Magic Resist. When damaged, deal 20% of the damage blocked to adjacent enemies as magic damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_GiantSized.Title: Giant-Sized
TFT13_GoopBuff_GiantSized.Description: Gain 1000 Health and grow greatly in size.

TFT13_GoopBuff_EnergyAbsorption.Title: Energy Absorption
TFT13_GoopBuff_EnergyAbsorption.Description: Gain 30 Ability Power. Each time an ally dies, gain 5% of their Ability Power.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Bully.Title: Bully
TFT13_GoopBuff_Bully.Description: Gain 18% Damage Amp, increased to 36% against units with a lower star level.

TFT13_GoopBuff_EssenceofNavori.Title: Essence of Navori
TFT13_GoopBuff_EssenceofNavori.Description: Max mana reduced by 10%, increased by 10% each time this champion casts (up to 40%).

TFT13_GoopBuff_AvalancheofArmor.Title: Avalanche of Armor
TFT13_GoopBuff_AvalancheofArmor.Description: Gain %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage equal to 25% of Armor. Gain 50 %i:scaleArmor% Armor.

TFT13_GoopBuff_TouchofFrost.Title: Touch of Frost
TFT13_GoopBuff_TouchofFrost.Description: Ability casts 20% <TFTKeyword>Chill</TFTKeyword> (reduce Attack Speed) enemies for 4 seconds. When <TFTKeyword>Chilled</TFTKeyword> enemies die, they stun the nearest enemy for 1 second.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Knockout.Title: Knockout
TFT13_GoopBuff_Knockout.Description: Gain 15% Attack Damage. The next attack after casting gains 35% Critical Strike Chance and deals 90% true damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_CenteroftheUniverse.Title: Center of the Universe
TFT13_GoopBuff_CenteroftheUniverse.Description: Gain 6 stars that orbit this champion. Each star deals 70 magic damage and the orbit expands to hit the champion's current target.

TFT13_GoopBuff_CosmicRhythm.Title: Cosmic Rhythm
TFT13_GoopBuff_CosmicRhythm.Description: No longer gain Mana but instead cast their Ability every 4 seconds.

TFT13_GoopBuff_ArcanaOverwhelming.Title: Arcana Overwhelming
TFT13_GoopBuff_ArcanaOverwhelming.Description: Gain %i:scaleAP% Ability Power equal to 25% of Magic Resist. Gain 50 Magic Resist.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Invisibility.Title: Invisibility
TFT13_GoopBuff_Invisibility.Description: Every 4 seconds, turn invisible for 1 second. The next attack has 100% Critical Strike Chance.

TFT13_GoopBuff_AllForOne.Title: Force of Friendship
TFT13_GoopBuff_AllForOne.Description: Gain 1% Damage Amp for each star level on your board. Three-star champions grant 8% Damage Amp instead.

TFT13_GoopBuff_OneThousandCuts.Title: One Thousand Cuts
TFT13_GoopBuff_OneThousandCuts.Description: Attacks deal 30 bonus true damage, plus 15 true damage for each time the target was damaged by this effect.

TFT13_GoopBuff_MageArmor.Title: Mage Armor
TFT13_GoopBuff_MageArmor.Description: Gain Armor and Magic Resist equal to 40% of Ability Power.

TFT13_GoopBuff_AvariceIncarnate.Title: Avarice Incarnate
TFT13_GoopBuff_AvariceIncarnate.Description: Gain 5 gold. Gain 15% Damage Amp and 1% more per 2 gold you have (up to 40%).

TFT13_GoopBuff_EvenInDeath.Title: Last Chance
TFT13_GoopBuff_EvenInDeath.Description: On first death, revive to full Health, gain 50% Attack Speed and 20% Omnivamp but lose 12.5% Health each second.

TFT13_GoopBuff_TitanicStrikes.Title: Titanic Strikes
TFT13_GoopBuff_TitanicStrikes.Description: Attacks deal an additional 30% Attack Damage to the target and adjacent enemies.

TFT13_GoopBuff_SlowCooker.Title: Slow Cooker
TFT13_GoopBuff_SlowCooker.Description: Every second, deal magic damage in a 1-hex radius equal to 4% of their max Health. Radius increases every 6 seconds.

TFT13_GoopBuff_HeavyHitter.Title: Heavy Hitter
TFT13_GoopBuff_HeavyHitter.Description: Attacks deal bonus physical damage equal to 20% of this champion's max Health. (Cooldown: 3 seconds)

TFT13_GoopBuff_LegacyOfShurima.Title: Legacy Of Shurima
TFT13_GoopBuff_LegacyOfShurima.Description: After 10 seconds of combat, ascend, gaining 40% max Health and 60% Attack Speed

TFT13_GoopBuff_ShareYourEnergy.Title: Share Your Energy
TFT13_GoopBuff_ShareYourEnergy.Description: Combat start: grant 12% of their Attack Damage, Ability Power, Health, Armor, and Magic Resist to adjacent allies.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Headhunter.Title: Headhunter
TFT13_GoopBuff_Headhunter.Description: This champion gains 15% Attack Speed. Every 1 kills, they permanently gain 1% more (doubled in Hyper Roll). <TFTTrackerLabel>(Total Kills: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT13_SetMechanic_EvolveBuff_Headhunter_CurrentKills@) </TFTTrackerLabel>

TFT13_GoopBuff_CullTheWeak.Title: Cull The Weak
TFT13_GoopBuff_CullTheWeak.Description: Gain up to 100% Critical Strike Chance based on target's missing Health. Every 3 seconds, target the lowest percent Health enemy in range.

TFT13_GoopBuff_SlimeTime.Title: Slime Time
TFT13_GoopBuff_SlimeTime.Description: Every 2 seconds, deal 100% (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage in a 1-hex radius and heal this champion for 100% of damage dealt.

TFT13_GoopBuff_UnstoppableForce.Title: Unstoppable Force
TFT13_GoopBuff_UnstoppableForce.Description: On takedown, charge the next target and Stun them for 1.5 seconds, then heal 10% max Health.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Fireball.Title: Fireball
TFT13_GoopBuff_Fireball.Description: For every 60 Mana spent, throw a 2-hex fireball that deals 7% max Health true damage and <TFTKeyword>Burns</TFTKeyword> for 5 seconds.

TFT13_GoopBuff_ScuttleFamiliar.Title: Scuttle Familiar
TFT13_GoopBuff_ScuttleFamiliar.Description: On death, summon a crab with 111% of their maximum Health, Armor, and Magic Resist.

TFT13_GoopBuff_CallingCard.Title: Calling Card
TFT13_GoopBuff_CallingCard.Description: Gain an emblem that matches a non-unique trait from this champion.

TFT13_GoopBuff_MagicMind.Title: Magic Expert
TFT13_GoopBuff_MagicMind.Description: This champion gains 40% more Ability Power from all sources.

TFT13_GoopBuff_ComebackStory.Title: Comeback Story
TFT13_GoopBuff_ComebackStory.Description: Gain 5% Damage Amp for every 10 player health you have lost this game.

TFT13_GoopBuff_HardenedMind.Title: Defense Expert
TFT13_GoopBuff_HardenedMind.Description: This champion gains 45% more Armor and Magic Resist from all sources.

TFT13_GoopBuff_SharpenedMind.Title: Attack Expert
TFT13_GoopBuff_SharpenedMind.Description: This champion gains 55% more Attack Damage from all sources.

TFT13_GoopBuff_DeftHands.Title: Mini Mees
TFT13_GoopBuff_DeftHands.Description: Gain 3 minis that deal 30% (%i:scaleAD%) Attack Damage every 3 attacks. Their attacks reduce Armor by 5.

TFT13_GoopBuff_PowerAbsorption.Title: Power Absorption
TFT13_GoopBuff_PowerAbsorption.Description: Gain 30% Attack Damage. Each time an ally dies, gain 5% of their Attack Damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Miniaturize.Title: Miniaturize
TFT13_GoopBuff_Miniaturize.Description: Transform into an item that gives 60% of their Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. Equipped items pop off.

TFT13_GoopBuff_DeepRoots.Title: Deep Roots
TFT13_GoopBuff_DeepRoots.Description: Gain 700 Health, 25 Armor, and 25 Magic Resist. They cannot move or be stunned, and pull their target into range.

TFT13_GoopBuff_WolfFamiliars.Title: Wolf Familiars
TFT13_GoopBuff_WolfFamiliars.Description: Summon 2 untargetable wolves with 35% of this champion's Attack Damage and 0.9 Attack Speed.

TFT13_GoopBuff_CertainDeath.Title: Diving In
TFT13_GoopBuff_CertainDeath.Description: On first cast, leap to enemies and stun in a 2-hex radius for 1.5 seconds and gain 25% Attack Speed and 20% Omnivamp.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Dragonsoul.Title: Dragonsoul
TFT13_GoopBuff_Dragonsoul.Description: This champion's first attack against a new target fires a Dragonsoul blast, dealing 20% max Health true damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_IntoTheUnknown.Title: Into the Unknown
TFT13_GoopBuff_IntoTheUnknown.Description: This champion disappears for 3 rounds. When they return, they gain 50 Ability Power and 50% Attack Damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_NothingWasted.Title: Nothing Wasted
TFT13_GoopBuff_NothingWasted.Description: When an ally dies, gain 100% of their current Mana.

TFT13_GoopBuff_UltimateHero.Title: Ultimate Hero
TFT13_GoopBuff_UltimateHero.Description: Star up a 3-star 1-cost champion to 4 stars!

TFT13_GoopBuff_LaserEyes.Title: Laser Eyes
TFT13_GoopBuff_LaserEyes.Description: Constantly deal 80% Ability Power magic damage per second in a 3-hex line and <TFTKeyword>Burn</TFTKeyword> enemies for 3 seconds.

TFT13_GoopBuff_HungerForPower.Title: Hunger For Power
TFT13_GoopBuff_HungerForPower.Description: Combat start: Consume the nearest ally and gain 60% of their Health and Attack Damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_DramaticEntrance.Title: Dramatic Entrance
TFT13_GoopBuff_DramaticEntrance.Description: Combat start: Leap off the battlefield. After 6 seconds, arrive with 70% increased max Health and <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> all enemies for 1.5 seconds.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Stoneskin.Title: Stoneskin
TFT13_GoopBuff_Stoneskin.Description: Combat start: Gain 225 Armor and Magic Resist. Every second, reduce this bonus by 10.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Repulsor.Title: Repulsor
TFT13_GoopBuff_Repulsor.Description: Gain 35% Attack Speed. On cast, knock back their target if within 2 hexes of them.
